text: China Zorrilla (, Concepción Matilde Zorrilla de San Martín Muñoz; 14 March 1922 – 17 September 2014) was an Uruguayan theater, movie, and television actress. She was known for her roles in La maffia, Esperando la carroza, Besos en la Frente, Conversations with Mother, and in Elsa & Fred. Zorrilla died on 17 September 2014 from pneumonia in a hospital in Montevideo, Uruguay, aged 92.China Zorrilla falleció hoy a los 92 años ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1922 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Montevideo Category:Stage actors Category:Television actors Category:Alumni of the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art Category:Argentine movie actors
title: China Zorrilla
